title: Bug 124777 - Setting a blank tooltip in chart title causes exception during preview
description: The bug report lacks sufficient details in the OB(Observe Behavior), EB(Expected Behavior), and SR(Steps to Reproduce) sections. Improvements are made to provide clarity and completeness.
OB: During chart preview, an unexpected exception occurs when moving the mouse over the chart title with a blank tooltip set.
EB: When previewing the chart in the viewer and moving the mouse over the chart title with a blank tooltip, nothing should happen. The expected result is a smooth and error-free experience.
SR:
1. Open the chart in preview mode.
2. Set a blank tooltip for the chart title.
3. Move the mouse over the chart title.
4. Observe the unexpected exception dialog that pops up.
